smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class LocationFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'LocationFragment' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'LocationFormatter' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function getUtmLatitudeBand appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: application.getSystemService(Context.SENSOR_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to SensorManager.

requireContext()
                    .getSystemService(Context.CLIPBOARD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to ClipboardManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.SENSOR_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to SensorManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.WINDOW_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to WindowManager.

smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of SettingsFragment.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of CompassLiveData.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of PositionalApplication.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function onCopyClick has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
ca.rmen.sunrisesunset.SunriseSunset.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
io.trewartha.positional.location.CoordinatesFormat.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.hardware.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
